comments: a(n-1) = sum_{k=0..ceiling((n-1)/2)} P(21;n-1-k,k), n>=1, with a(-1)=20. These are the SW-NE diagonals in P(21;n,k), the (21,1) Pascal triangle. Cf. A093645 for the (10,1) Pascal triangle. Observation by _Paul Barry_, Apr 29 2004. Proof via recursion relations and comparison of inputs.
